title: 68/189/EEC: Council Decision of 9 April 1968 amending the Rules of the Advisory Committee on Vocational Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 9 April 1968 amending the Rules of the Advisory Committee on Vocational Training (68/189/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following shall be substituted for the provisions of Article 5 of the Rules of the Advisory Committee on Vocational Training:
"The term of office for members and alternates shall be two years. Their appointments may be renewed.
After expiry of their term of office, members and alternates shall remain in office until they are replaced or until their appointments are renewed."
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 9 April 1968.
For the Council
The President
E. FAURE
